# TestsOutputXML.LogFileName property

Name of the txt file to write the output pre and post conditions test results. The default name is PrePostConditionsLogXML.xml, saved on the same directory where the application is. The file name can include a path.

```csharp
public static string LogFileName { get; set; }
```
